summary: This is a Federal Express invoice dated December 25, 2000, for J Epstein & Co Inc, detailing shipping charges for packages sent and received between December 13-20, 2000. It lists senders and recipients associated with Epstein's company, revealing business and personal contacts during this period.

persons.name: J Epstein
persons.context: The invoice is for his company, J Epstein & Co Inc, and he is listed as both a sender and recipient on several shipments.

persons.name: John Alessi
persons.context: Listed as a sender from J Epstein & Co Inc on multiple shipments to various recipients in December 2000.

connections.description: Alessi is listed as a sender from J Epstein & Co Inc, indicating he worked for Epstein's company.
Wintner is listed as a sender from J Epstein & Co Inc, indicating she worked for Epstein's company.
A package was sent from Epstein's company to Don Jaffe at the law firm Vows Sater Seymour & Pease.
Alessi sent a package from J Epstein & Co Inc to Eric Gany.
Wintner sent packages from J Epstein & Co Inc to Peg Ugland at New Albany Property Inc.

events.title: Multiple shipments from Epstein's company
events.description: Packages were picked up from J Epstein & Co Inc and sent to various recipients including Eric Gany, Peg Ugland, and Peter H Bett.

events.title: Further shipments and delivery attempts
events.description: Multiple packages were picked up and some delivery attempts failed with notes like 'RECIPIENT NOT IN BUSINESS CLOSED'.

locations: 457 Madison Ave, New York, NY 10022-6809 (J Epstein & Co Inc office)
457 Madison Ave, 4th Fl, New York, NY 10022 (Alternate address for J Epstein & Co)
keyFacts: J Epstein & Co Inc was actively shipping and receiving packages via FedEx in December 2000, with an invoice totaling $284.88.
Employees John Alessi and Lauren K Wintner are repeatedly listed as senders on shipments from Epstein's company.
Recipients of packages include business associates (Eric Gany, Peter H Bett), a law firm contact (Don Jaffe), and entities like New Albany Property Inc.
Some delivery attempts in mid-December 2000 failed with notes indicating the recipient's business was closed.
The document shows Epstein's company operating from 457 Madison Ave in New York during this period.
